title: Dinnerbone: 正在大手笔地进行区块优化
author: cyqsimon
txt_content:
Dinnerbone: I have been doing terrible things to chunk loading & sending. Best case scenario, a much smoother game. Worst case, everything ever broke.
Dinnerbone: 我刚才在对区块加载和收发做奇怪的事情。最佳情况，流畅度大幅提升。最差情况，全部玩坏。


O.o
